thread.title: What viewers make of those taking part in the BBC1 election...

author: Neil_Shaw
title: What viewers make of those taking part in the BBC1 election...
text:
What viewers make of those taking part in the BBC1 election debate By Neil_Shaw | Posted: May 31, 2017 0 COMMENTS SHARES What viewers make of those taking part in the BBC1 election debate What viewers make of those taking part in the BBC1 election debate X 
Copy link to paste in your message / Comments (0) 
The polls say Labour is closing in on the Conservatives, and one even claims the Tories will lose the General Election. 
That's a far cry from the PM's plan to secure a mandate for Brexit with a strong and stable Government. 
So how will the part spokespeople fare in tonight's BBC1 debate? 
Have your say by rating them live in our widget below, and see what others think of the performance.
